name: rioter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of a group of people who meet in a public place and behave in a noisy, violent, and uncontrolled way, often as a protest: Police and rioters clashed violently. She watched rioters setting fire to the vehicles. See
riot
More examplesFewer examplesThe streets were filled with protesters and rioters.Soldiers used tear gas to disperse the rioters.15 rioters were arrested before calm was restored.
